name: Fictional History Timeline
description: A StoryFlint template by Kevin BarrettThis Notion Template is great for storytellers looking to start building their world and organizing its history. Keep track of events, characters, and locations for your story's past.Why did I create this?While rewatching the TV show, LOST, I wanted to get a better understanding of its complicated timeline of events. I created a Notion dashboard – LOST Timeline – that organized all the events of the show and allowed me to view the show's timeline from a vari
